original_title: The Agency: Pursuit of the Ares Virus
overview: The first installment in The Agency Trilogy. A criminal organization named 'the black dragons', has created a virus that will make the world very sick. Now, the C.I.A must take down one of the world's most feared criminal organization's in the world before they release the powerful virus that will bring the whole world to its knees
tagline: Stop the virus. Save the world.
title: The Agency: Pursuit of the Ares Virus
